availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joel H. Goodloe (Caldwell/ Hopkins co,. ky, laborer and blacksmith)

body.p: Caldwell County and Hopkins County, Kentucky, laborer and blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married to America B. Lynn Goodloe in Montgomery County, Tennessee, on July 2, 1853. Father of Mary J. Goodloe, William M. Goodloe, and A. T. Goodloe. Laborer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Blacksmith in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 328B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 735.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Montgomery County Marriages, 1838-1874.
"J. H. Goodloe (1821-1898)," Find A Grave, Memorial #67650112, accessed September 30, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67650112.
